first_para: Geoffrey Nicholas "Nick" de Bois (born 23 February 1959) is a British Conservative Party politician, who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament for Enfield North, defeating the Labour incumbent MP Joan Ryan. De Bois has four grown-up children.

full.extract: Geoffrey Nicholas "Nick" de Bois (born 23 February 1959) is a British Conservative Party politician, who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament for Enfield North, defeating the Labour incumbent MP Joan Ryan. De Bois has four grown-up children.
full.title: Nick de Bois
